snippet.title: Pete's Peril | Trailer
snippet.description:
Pete's Peril is an adventure game that takes Pete in and out of different caves, mines, buildings and mountains to solve puzzles of all skill levels. Dodging boulders, grabbing diamonds, upgrading tools, clothing for different climates and crush enemies along the way is all part of his peril.

Wishlist on Steam:   https://store.steampowered.com/app/2128120/Petes_Peril/

​ #devlog #gamedev #madewithunity #indiegames #steam
